name: SCHOOOL Glass Notes
description: Glass Notes is a location-based virtual post-it notes developed by SCHOOOL.   Capture virtual Glass Notes that contain useful English expressions for daily use based on your location. If you are near a bank, the English expressions commonly used in the bank pop up on your smartphone.    Create your own Glass Notes and paste them anywhere. Use them for your location-based virtual notes.    Glass AR detects a dominant object in an image, and shows you related English expressions.  ---------------- Glass Notes uses a location-based augmented reality technology. With this technology, SCHOOOL has developed virtual Glass Notes and located them around the globe. The Glass Notes contains useful English expressions frequently used in each location. The expressions vary based on the location types such as hospitals and shopping malls. You can glass (find) the virtual Notes using this app, and once glassed, if you touch the expression on the Notes, Glass reads it for you.   Moreover, you can create your own Glass Notes by yourself and locate them anywhere in the world. Create Notes containing expressions you need for your study, and attach them anywhere you want. Glass them again anytime later.   The globe has become your own notepad now.      /  / SCHOOOL /    /   /
